en: God is our refuge and strength, A very present help in trouble.
hmr: Pathien chu ei inhumhimna le ei hrâtna, Lunginzîng laia ṭhangpui vartu hnai zing a nih.

en: Therefore will we not fear, though the earth do change, And though the mountains be shaken into the heart of the seas;
hmr: Chuleiin, leilung hi hung danglamin, Tlânghai hi tuisuoriet sûng daiah insawn sien khawm ṭi nâwng ei ta;

en: Though the waters thereof roar and be troubled, Though the mountains tremble with the swelling thereof. [Selah
hmr: A tuihai chu inri hum humin, so bur bur sienla khawm, A fâwn nasa leiin tlânghai hi inhnîng dur dur sien khawm ṭi chuong bawk nâwng ei tih.

en: There is a river, the streams whereof make glad the city of God, The holy place of the tabernacles of the Most High.
hmr: Vadung pakhat a um a, chu kau chun Pathien khawpuihai chu a suklâwm hlak, Achunghnungtak umna hmun inthieng chu.

en: God is in the midst of her; she shall not be moved: God will help her, and that right early.
hmr: Pathien chu a lai takah a um a, inhnîng naw nih a, Pathienin khawfingchat pha chun ṭhangpui a tih.

en: The nations raged, the kingdoms were moved: He uttered his voice, the earth melted.
hmr: Hnam tin an inri hum hum a, ramhai chu ân hnîng a, Ama chun a râwl ân suoh a, leihnuoi hi ân tui zo tah a.

en: Jehovah of hosts is with us; The God of Jacob is our refuge. [Selah
hmr: Sipaihai LALPA chu ei kuomah a um a, Jakob Pathien chu ei kulbîng insâng a nih.

en: Come, behold the works of Jehovah, What desolations he hath made in the earth.
hmr: Hung unla, LALPA thilthawhai hi en ta u, Leihnuoia thil a suksietziehai hi.

en: He maketh wars to cease unto the end of the earth; He breaketh the bow, and cutteth the spear in sunder; He burneth the chariots in the fire.
hmr: Ama chun indonahai chu kâwlkawdawng chenin a sukbo hlak a, Thalngul chu a sukthliek a, fei chu a sât bawng hlak a. Tawlailîrhai chu meiah a raw hmang hlak.

en: Be still, and know that I am God: I will be exalted among the nations, I will be exalted in the earth.
hmr: To unla, Pathien ka nih ti hi hre ro, Hnam tin lai chawimawiin um ka ta, hnuoia hin chawimawiin um ka tih.

en: Jehovah of hosts is with us; The God of Jacob is our refuge. [Selah
hmr: Sipaihai LALPA chu ei kuomah a um a, Jakob Pathien chu ei kulbîng insâng a nih.
